org.eclipse.eef.ide.ui.internal.widgets

Class EEFListLifecycleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.eef.ide.ui.api.widgets.AbstractEEFLifecycleManager
      • org.eclipse.eef.ide.ui.api.widgets.AbstractEEFWidgetLifecycleManager
        • org.eclipse.eef.ide.ui.internal.widgets.EEFListLifecycleManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEEFLifecycleManager

    public class EEFListLifecycleManager
extends AbstractEEFWidgetLifecycleManager
    This class will be used in order to manager the lifecycle of a list widget.
